question: The 29th series of IndiaIndonesia CORPAT is being conducted at ________.
explanation: The 29th series of IndiaIndonesia CORPAT is scheduled from 09 to 25 May 17 with the opening ceremony being conducted at Port Blair of Andaman and Nicobar icelands. The CORPAT reflects the shared concerns between the two countries for the peaceful Indian Ocean for the benefit of an international community. The closing ceremony of the CORPAT is scheduled at Belawan, Indonesia from 22 - 25 May 17.
